column4: This says ubuntu 32-bit is "certified" for thinkpad t520, but nothing about 64-bit.  What would I lose by installing 32-bit instead of 64-bit?
if you need to ask - stick to 32bit.  The big advantage to 64bit is access to more then 3.2GB of RAM (without 1-10% performance hit of PAE)
with that much memory i'd consider 64bit then
